ygData.subject: Re: Gnome Necromancers in Neriak?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/28/99 1:52:10 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... too ... Take the word RELATIVELY seriously here... When you first enter the forest from east
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/28/99 1:52:10 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
sidney_earley@... writes:

> Does anyone out there have any experience with Gnome necromancers traveling
> into Neriak? I have killed some Crushbone orcs in Lesser Faydark, but not
> alot. Is there a relative safe barometer within Neriak I could con that
> would give me an indication of my faction before I wander around in there
too
> much?

Take the word RELATIVELY seriously here...

When you first enter the forest from east commons ... there is a guard that
wanders right to the edge of the chasm that is the zone... if you wait until
he comes by that direction you can con him... he is not a real high level
guard... but still tough enough... his CON should be what you get throughout
Neriak.

Remember to cast invis to undead though since the ghouls guarding the necro
guild will always hate you.

Sonoroud Tomebinder.
